input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product specification information.

Product specification:
Product specification:
DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton, 405-Yard, Size 20, Black

Product specifications:
Perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more
Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish
It is 1.76-ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius)
Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed
Highly colorfast
Available in black color
Measures 405-Yard length and comes in size 20

Product description:
input_text.Response A: DMC Cebelia Crochet Cotton is a high quality 100% cotton yarn. It is perfect for crochet projects such as fashion garments, bedspreads, tablecloths, doilies and more. The yarn is double mercerized and combed for a smooth and silky finish. It is highly colorfast and machine washable, and can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed. The yarn comes in a wide range of colors and measures 405 yards in length.
input_text.Response B: This DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton is perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more. Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish. It is 1.76 ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius). Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed. Highly colorfast. Measures 405-yard length and comes in size 20. This cotton is available in black color.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
